name: Native
summary: A DAZZLING GAME OF COSMIC ENCOUNTER! The final showdown has begun! At the controls of your powerful interstellar craft, you maneuver into enemy territory. Your mission: to destroy the evil forces who have held the cosmos in fear and relentless suffering. It's a fight to death against an uncommon cadre of space oddities - gigantic slithering serpents, whirling space bugs and fantastic galactic warships. Can you endure the onslaught in the Atari Jaguar's finest 2D shoot'em up? The fate of the cosmos is in your hands... Horizontal and vertical scrolling in 60 frames per Second! Transparency and lightning effects show the power of the Jaguar! Over 100 objects simultaneous on screen - a shooter's nightmare!
